amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress on funding for assistant to combat AIDS globally.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1174 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 78 - 18. Record Vote Number: 270.

action.text: Amendment SA 1174 proposed by Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9182-9191; text: CR S9182) To express the sense of Congress on funding for assistant to combat AIDS globally.
